title: Come with Me (2022) - full transcript
plot: A timid orphaned Samira lives alone with her half brother Jason in the house left to them by their Dad in the middle of an underdeveloped sparsely populated estate. After her bother travels for a business trip, her friends pull her into a girl's night out where she meets a charming young man called Ben. They have a good time together talking and drinking and eventually with the help of her friends, she invites Ben over for a nightcap. Unknown to her Ben is a member of a kidnapper rink along with his partner Roy and they've been hired by her own brother to kidnap and eventually kill her. Nothing goes according to plan though as Ben starts having second thoughts and decides to rescue Samira instead. Unfortunately it's too late as Samira finds out about the plot and tries to escape and alert the police. But after failing to do so repeatedly and with no help in sight, she takes matters into her own hands and fights for her life.

plot: Three young men entered the same dream. They all have issues with anger and unforgiveness. The queen of dreams takes them on a journey and tells them to find the book of wisdom it is the only way they will cure their problems in real life. The three young men meet up with the strangest characters that a dream could conjure. During the journey all three discover that finding the book of wisdom would be the most mystical secret known to man.
